${ModID}:HeavenlyWrath.NAME: Heavenly Wrath
${ModID}:HeavenlyWrath.DESCRIPTION: !HIT!. NL !WW!{!M!|>0= and increase its dequip damage by !M!}.

${ModID}:WhateverllDo.NAME: Whatever'll Do!
${ModID}:WhateverllDo.DESCRIPTION: Choose to ${ModID}:Wield a random weapon {!Upgrades!|>0=and/}or a random shield.

${ModID}:WieldRandomBoth.NAME: Both
${ModID}:WieldRandomBoth.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Wield a random weapon and a random shield.

${ModID}:ShovelKnightCard.NAME: Reuse
${ModID}:ShovelKnightCard.DESCRIPTION: !HIT!. NL Exhaust 1 card.{!Upgrades!|0= NL If it's an Attack, ${ModID}:Hit again.}

${ModID}:DoubleUp.NAME: Double Up
${ModID}:DoubleUp.DESCRIPTION: !HIT!. NL This turn, ${ModID}:Guards grant Block !M! additional time{!M!|>1=s}.!WEIGHT!

${ModID}:Reverberate.NAME: Reverberate
${ModID}:Reverberate.DESCRIPTION: This turn, ${ModID}:Hits deal damage !M! additional time{!M!|>1=s}.!WEIGHT!

${ModID}:PaperTrail.NAME: Paper Trail
${ModID}:PaperTrail.DESCRIPTION: If the last card played this combat was ${ModID}:Stamped, !GUARD!.

${ModID}:InkSpill.NAME: Ink Spill
${ModID}:InkSpill.DESCRIPTION: !HIT!. NL ${ModID}:Stamp !M! card{!M!|>0=s} in your draw pile.

${ModID}:OverAndOver.NAME: Over And Over
${ModID}:OverAndOver.DESCRIPTION: {!${ModID}:h!|0=|1=${ModID}:Hit. NL |@=${ModID}:Hit !${ModID}:h! times. NL }${ModID}:Hit for each card played this turn.

${ModID}:Slam.NAME: Slam
${ModID}:Slam.DESCRIPTION: {!${ModID}:h!|0=|1=${ModID}:Hit. NL |@=${ModID}:Hit !${ModID}:h! times. NL }${ModID}:Hit for each ${ModID}:Weight you bear.

${ModID}:Bulwark.NAME: Bulwark
${ModID}:Bulwark.DESCRIPTION: {!${ModID}:g!|0=|1=${ModID}:Guard. NL |@=${ModID}:Guard !${ModID}:h! times. NL }${ModID}:Guard for each ${ModID}:Weight you bear.

${ModID}:Overextend.NAME: Overextend
${ModID}:Overextend.DESCRIPTION: !HIT!. NL Your next {!M!|1=card|@=!M! cards} will not ${ModID}:Hit or ${ModID}:Guard.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Your next card will not #yHit or #yGuard.

${ModID}:ProfitMargin.NAME: Profit Margin
${ModID}:ProfitMargin.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you spend NL [${ModID}:TixIcon] , gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:SealOfApproval.NAME: Seal of Approval
${ModID}:SealOfApproval.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain !M! Block per ${ModID}:Stamp on it.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain #b

${ModID}:Perpetuity.NAME: Perpetuity
${ModID}:Perpetuity.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next {!M!|1=time|@=!M! times} you would consume Vigor or ${ModID}:Aegis.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next time you would consume #yVigor or #yAegis.

${ModID}:Invest.NAME: Invest
${ModID}:Invest.DESCRIPTION: Gain {!M!|>0=Gain{!M!|repeat= [${ModID}:TixIcon]} . NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Exploit.NAME: Exploit
${ModID}:Exploit.DESCRIPTION: !HIT!. NL The next !M! time{!M!|>1=s} you attack this enemy, NL gain [E].
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: time you attack this enemy, gain [E] .
times you attack this enemy, gain [E] .

${ModID}:Whirligig.NAME: Whirligig
${ModID}:Whirligig.DESCRIPTION: Every {!M!|1=time|2=2nd time|3=3rd time|@=!M!th time} you ${ModID}:Guard, ${ModID}:Guard again.

${ModID}:Grindset.NAME: Grindset
${ModID}:Grindset.DESCRIPTION: !HIT!. NL ${ModID}:Stamp this card{!M!|1=|2= twice|@= !M! times}. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Surge.NAME: Surge
${ModID}:Surge.DESCRIPTION: {!M!|1=Double|2=Triple|3=Quadruple|@=Gain Vigor equal to !M! times} your Vigor.

${ModID}:SavingsAccount.NAME: Savings Account
${ModID}:SavingsAccount.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain {!M!|repeat= [${ModID}:TixIcon]}{!${ModID}:m2!|1= and draw 1 fewer card|>1= and draw !${ModID}:m2! fewer cards|@= }.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain #b

${ModID}:Dismiss.NAME: Dismiss
${ModID}:Dismiss.DESCRIPTION: !GUARD!. NL Discard up to !M! card{!M!|>1=s} from your draw pile.

${ModID}:SendIt.NAME: Send It
${ModID}:SendIt.DESCRIPTION: Play a ${ModID}:Stamped card from your {!Upgrades!|>0=draw or }discard pile.!WEIGHT!

${ModID}:Unleash.NAME: Unleash
${ModID}:Unleash.DESCRIPTION: !GUARD!. NL !HIT!. NL ${ModID}:Aegis and Vigor affect this card !M! time{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:Lift.NAME: Lift
${ModID}:Lift.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Vigor{!${ModID}:m2!|>1= and bear !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Weight}.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain #b
At the start of your turn, bear #b

${ModID}:CashOut.NAME: Cash Out
${ModID}:CashOut.DESCRIPTION: !HIT!. NL Discard your hand. NL Gain{!M!|repeat= [${ModID}:TixIcon]} for each card discarded.

${ModID}:FirstClass.NAME: First Class
${ModID}:FirstClass.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if ${ModID}:Stamped. NL !HIT!.{!M!|>0= NL Gain !M! Vigor.}

${ModID}:PackageDeal.NAME: Package Deal
${ModID}:PackageDeal.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Stamp a card{!M!|1=|@=!M! times}. NL ${ModID}:Hit for each ${ModID}:Stamp on it.

${ModID}:Payday.NAME: Payday
${ModID}:Payday.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, gain{!M!|repeat= [${ModID}:TixIcon]} and Exhaust.

${ModID}:MassMail.NAME: Mass Mail
${ModID}:MassMail.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next{!M!|>1= !M!} ${ModID}:Stamped card{!M!|>1=s} {!M!|1=is|@=are} played twice.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next #yStamped card is played twice.

${ModID}:ReturnToSender.NAME: Return to Sender
${ModID}:ReturnToSender.DESCRIPTION: !HIT!. NL Put !M! ${ModID}:Stamped card{!M!|>1=s} from your draw or discard piles into your hand.

${ModID}:BrandEmblem.NAME: Brand Emblem
${ModID}:BrandEmblem.DESCRIPTION: !HIT!. NL Permanently ${ModID}:Stamp a random card in your deck{!M!|1=|@=!M! times}.

${ModID}:Inure.NAME: Inure
${ModID}:Inure.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP from ${ModID}:Weight, NL gain{!M!|repeat= [${ModID}:TixIcon]} and NL gain{!M!|repeat= [E]} next turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP from #yWeight, gain #b

${ModID}:Splurge.NAME: Splurge
${ModID}:Splurge.DESCRIPTION: [${ModID}:TixIcon] draw !M! additional card{!M!|>1=s}{!${ModID}:m2!|>0= and grant !${ModID}:m2! Block} this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you spend #yTix this turn, gain #b

${ModID}:Bide.NAME: Biding Time
${ModID}:Bide.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL The next !${ModID}:m2! card{!${ModID}:m2!|>1=s} you play will not ${ModID}:Guard.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The next card you play will not #yGuard.

${ModID}:Grandeur.NAME: Grandeur
${ModID}:Grandeur.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you spend NL [${ModID}:TixIcon] , ${ModID}:Stamp the drawn card.{!${ModID}:m2!|>0= NL Gain}{!${ModID}:m2!|repeat= [${ModID}:TixIcon]}{!${ModID}:m2!|>0= .}
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card using #yTix, stamp it.
Whenever you draw a card using #yTix, stamp it #b

${ModID}:DropAnchor.NAME: Drop Anchor
${ModID}:DropAnchor.DESCRIPTION: !HIT!. You cannot bear ${ModID}:Weight {!M!|1=this turn|@=for !M! turns}.{!${ModID}:m2!|>0= NL Lose !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Weight.}
